thread.title: Twin minor explosions in Agra near Cantt railway station
thread.title_full: Twin minor explosions in Agra near Cantt railway station

author: FE Online
title: Twin minor explosions in Agra near Cantt railway station
text:
Twin minor explosions in Agra near Cantt railway station Twin minor explosions in Agra near Cantt railway station Even though there are no casualties reported, there were two explosions near Agra Cantt station. A threat letter was also left on railway track. Even though the DIG police of Agra undermined the explosions and the impact, and said that the explosives are simple and crude. The area was cordoned off but now the area [â€¦] By: FE Online | Published: March 18, 2017 10:29 AM The area was cordoned off but now the area is cleared. (File Photo; Reuters) 
Even though there are no casualties reported, there were two explosions near Agra Cantt station. A threat letter was also left on railway track. Even though the DIG police of Agra undermined the explosions and the impact, and said that the explosives are simple and crude. The area was cordoned off but now the area is cleared. 
More details awaited:
